text: Bishkek-1 () is a train station located in the western part of Bishkek, Kyrgyzstan. Bishkek-2 railway station is located in the city center, while this station is located western part of the city. ==Trains== * Bishkek — NovokuznetskБишкек 1 - вокзал, Бишкек - расписание поездов * Bishkek — Shu ==See also== *Kyrgyz Railways *Bishkek-2 railway station ==References== Category:Railway stations in Kyrgyzstan Category:Buildings and structures in Bishkek
title: Bishkek-1 railway station
